official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that former National Security Advisor, Robert C. McFarlane, be commended for his outstanding service to the American people, to the President, and to his country.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that former White House Security Affairs Adviser Robert C. McFarlane be commended for his outstanding service to the American people, to the President, and to his country.
